request.description: Get loyalty points for a customer
Get loyalty tier for a customer

request.description: Get loyalty points history for a customer by date range

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Free Cake",
  "description": "Get a free cake with your next purchase",
  "pointsCost": 500,
  "active": true,
  "expiryDays": 30
}

{
  "name": "Free Premium Cake",
  "description": "Get a free premium cake with your next purchase",
  "pointsCost": 600,
  "active": true,
  "expiryDays": 45
}

{
  "name": "Gold",
  "description": "Gold tier with exclusive benefits",
  "pointsThreshold": 1000,
  "multiplier": 1.5,
  "benefits": ["Free delivery", "Priority service"]
}

{
  "name": "Platinum",
  "description": "Platinum tier with exclusive benefits",
  "pointsThreshold": 2000,
  "multiplier": 2.0,
  "benefits": ["Free delivery", "Priority service", "Exclusive discounts"]
}

item.name: Promotions & Discounts
item.description: Endpoints for managing promotions and discounts

request.description: Get a promotion by promo code
Get active promotions by discount type
